title: Still Awaiting Feedback for Event
body:
Hi,

I am still awaiting feedback regarding my 1v1 tournament from Riot. Seeing as it is tomorrow morning when is this going to happen. The events link has been glitchy all week, half the stuff stalls when loading the page, that's if it loads at all.

Just thought I should mention it, could be a bug in the system.

replies.body: Hey we are seeing some issues with the platform at the moment. Please contact me through email  to get this sorted (you should have received an email from me earlier today).
